tests.name: simple_example
tests.title: Simple Example
tests.fqs:
Simple Example

Hap.py | birth day  to | you - ; |
K&1 cc  | d c f  | e  |
counter: 3

L:1/4
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
C/2C/2| [M:3/4] D C F| E -E z|

Test Key Signature Changes

ABCHeader
ABCHeader
C D E F| [K:F# major] C D E F| [K:Eb major] C D E F|

tests.name: octave_resets_in_each_block
tests.title: Octave resets in each block
tests.description: Octave resets in each block - pitch test
tests.fqs:
Octave resets in each block

* * * |  * * * |
K#4 e f g | a b c |

* * * |  * * * |
K#4 e f g | a b c |

- * * |  * * * |
K#4  f g | a b c |
tests.expected_abc:
L:1/4
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
ABCHeader
E F G| A B c|
E F G| A B c|
-c f g| a b c'|
